title: Low Priority Queue games randomly reset timer
body:
Hello,
I know i deserved this punishment but as I was playing through my Low Priority Queue games just fine until i got to the 4th one where I invited a friend to play with me. As they only had like an hour left of play time was just wanting to get a single game with them out of the way. then when it reached a certain time left it decided to jump back up to 20 minutes. Could it be because invited someone else to play with?

[img]https://i.imgur.com/6ojTUIP.png[/img]

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa that looks pretty weird. Even though you've already played out the LPQ games, if you don't mind I want you to go ahead and shoot our techs a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this screenshot so they can take a deeper look into this and maybe get to the bottom of it.
